name: Sanjay Cheekati
title: Full Stack Developer specializing in MERN, AI/ML, and modern web applications

projects.name: PureText - Advanced Text Processing Tool
projects.description: Modern web application for text manipulation with real-time processing, multiple transformation options, and clean UI. Feature-rich text processing tool built with React and modern web technologies.

projects.name: Multi-Objective Genetic Algorithm for Healthcare
projects.description: Production-ready optimization framework implementing K-means clustering integrated with NSGA-II for Home Health Care scheduling. Achieves 35% improvement in route efficiency and 40% reduction in scheduling conflicts.

projects.name: BERT-based Sensitive Content Moderation
projects.description: Enterprise-grade NLP system using BERT transformer for real-time sensitive content detection with 94% accuracy. Deep learning content moderation API achieving 94% accuracy on multi-class classification.

projects.name: Full-Stack Portfolio Platform
projects.description: Production-grade portfolio platform built with React 18, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Features server-side contact form with email integration, animated UI components, and SEO optimization.

achievements: Built production-ready BERT NLP system with 94% accuracy
Developed genetic algorithm achieving 35% efficiency improvement in healthcare scheduling
Created real-time text processing tool serving users at puretext.me
Designed and deployed full-stack portfolio with 95+ Lighthouse score
summary: Sanjay Cheekati is a Full Stack Developer specializing in MERN stack, AI/ML, and NLP technologies. With expertise in building production-grade applications including a BERT-based content moderation system (94% accuracy), genetic algorithm optimization for healthcare (35% efficiency gain), and real-time web applications, Sanjay combines strong software engineering skills with machine learning capabilities. Currently a BTech 4th-year student, actively seeking Full Stack Developer or AI/ML Developer roles starting January 2026.
